application.name: hijitter
application.brief: Export PDS product containing ideal camera and related spice data from an isis3 image.

description.pre:
Export PDS Metadata (text file) containing ideal camera and related spice data from an isis3 image. This application creates PDS text file that will allow both ISIS3 and non-ISIS3 users to associate each pixel on the PDS ideal image with the same position on the targeted body as the original Isis3 ideal cube within the ground resolution of half a pixel accurately.
PDS Metadata will contain the following isis information:
Core
Original HiRise Label(PDS)
Instrument Group
Kernels Group
Original Instrument Group
Tables
In addition the the CK and SPK Spice Kernel file will be a separate file we make available for nonIsis users.
The ISIS3 cube will be in Band Sequential Foramt(BSQ) to be compatible with PDS format. The Core Object in PDS Metadata indicates the StartByte of the image in isis3 cube.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Cube from which the ideal camera and related spice data is exported
parameter.description: Input cube from which the ideal camera and related spice data is exported to PDS.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.brief: Output Cube in BSQ format to be compatible with the PDS.
parameter.description: Output Cube in BSQ format to be compatible with the PDS

parameter.name: PDS_METADATA_FILE
parameter.brief: Output text file with PDS data
parameter.description: Output text file with PDS data. This file contains the ideal camera and related spice data in PDS format.

parameter.name: CK
parameter.description: If enabled specify a file to get the CK Spice Kernel

parameter.name: CKFILE
parameter.description: NAIF compatible SPICE CK kernel from the ISIS cube. The cube must have been initialized with the spiceinit program.

parameter.name: SPK
parameter.description: If enabled specify a file to get the SPK Spice Kernel

parameter.name: SPKFILE
parameter.description: NAIF compatible SPICE SPK kernel from the ISIS cube. The cube must have been initialized with the spiceinit program.

parameter.name: SPKTYPE
parameter.brief: Specify the type of SPK Kernel
parameter.description: Specify the type of SPK Kernel

option.description: Lagrange Interpolation with Unequal Time Steps(9)
Hermite Interpolation with Unequal Time Steps(13)
